text: my name is efrain Alvarado I'm the
administrative judge of the Bronx
Criminal Division this sunday July 24th
I'm one of 70 New York City judges who
will be for the first time in the
history of New York State presiding over
gay marriages as the administrative
judge of the Criminal Division I have
presided over homicides rapes the most
serious charges but sunday I'm getting
up bright and early making my breakfast
and jumping into my car with a smile on
my face because I'm coming down here
parking my car and walking into a
building to give civil rights to people
who haven't had them for a long time up
until the legislature changed a lot my
thinking was why shouldn't individuals
be able to have the same legal benefits
that I am my wife had by getting a
license in being married on Sunday i
expect the crowd will be competing with
the yankee game they say yankee games
but to me it's wonderful to be able to
say to someone you've now made a
commitment to each other go out and
enjoy the rest of your lives together
